sections.titleLine2: Built by an Elite AI Team
sections.subtitle: A dedicated pod of AI engineers builds and runs a custom Executive OS around how you lead — so you reclaim time and make sharper decisions.
sections.ctaSubtext: Limited spots — designed for 12 visionary leaders

sections.badge: What This Program Is Designed to Achieve

outcomes.text: Reclaim meaningful hours every week from email, reporting, and meeting prep
Shorten the time from 'question' to 'clarity' in your decision-making
Reduce context switching and cognitive overload across tools and channels
Turn your routine into a Personal Executive OS that runs quietly in the background

sections.foundingTitle: This is the first version of the Executive AI Partner Program.
sections.foundingDescription: We're inviting a small group of executives to be our founding cohort. You'll work directly with the core team behind the program, influence the playbook and evolution of the Personal Executive OS, and get white-glove, high-touch implementation built around your way of leading.

sections.titleLine1: For Executives Who Must Lead AI Transformation —
sections.criteriaIntro: This is for you if you are:

criteria.text: A C-level or P&L-owner in a complex business
Expected to 'make AI happen' for your company
Operating with a 120% calendar and constant context-switching
With no time for experimentation, hype, or new tools to learn

sections.conclusionDescription: Because your AI transformation must start with you — your routine, your mental models, your decisions — not with a generic dashboard or an off-the-shelf assistant.

sections.title: You already operate at the highest level.
sections.subtitle: AI is the next multiplier — but only if it adapts to you.

realityItems.text: You don't need to become a prompt engineer.
You don't need conferences, newsletters, or 200 articles to "keep up."

needsItems.text: A Personal Executive OS built specifically for your role
An embedded team that understands how you think and decide
Confidential access to your tools, files, and context
Custom automations aligned with your decision-making style
A second brain that dramatically compresses your cognitive workload

sections.thisIsDescription: An embedded elite team of AI engineers + automation architects,
sections.thisIsHighlight: dedicated exclusively to your workflow, your systems, your company.

capabilities.text: We integrate with every system you use,
build AI agents that work exactly like you think,
and create custom tools no vendor will ever build for your role.

sections.bottomLine2: Our job is to automate everything else.

sections.title: We turn your daily routine into an automated system that works for you, learns from you, and amplifies your leadership.
sections.automationsIntro: Examples of what we automate or enhance:

steps.title: Executive Deep Dive
steps.description: We plug into your entire ecosystem:
steps.highlight: You don't change how you work. We adapt to you.

steps.title: Build Your Personal Executive OS
steps.highlight: All in a secure, private, auditable system designed around your role.

steps.title: Build Your Custom AI Agents
steps.description: You get custom-built agents — like specialized chiefs of staff:
steps.highlight: Each one tuned precisely to your workflow, vocabulary, priorities, and blind spots.

steps.title: Automate Your Workflow End-to-End
steps.highlight: Your day becomes lighter. Your decisions become sharper. Your leadership becomes exponential.

steps.title: Continuous Optimization
steps.highlight: Your Personal Executive OS becomes a competitive weapon.

sections.subtitle: No exceptions.
sections.traitsOutro: And requires a dedicated engineering pod per executive.
sections.acceptanceText: If you're accepted, you get a dedicated engineering pod building and evolving your Personal Executive OS,
sections.acceptanceHighlight: for your unique way of leading.

sections.titleLine1: Lead the AI future by becoming
sections.titleLine2: the first AI-augmented version of yourself.
sections.subtitle: You can't scale AI in your company until you scale your own executive capabilities.
sections.keyPointsOutro: Built around you — not around a tool.

nextSteps.text: If there's mutual fit, we sign NDA
We schedule your Executive Deep Dive
